verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> you are to pass <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> this <S%H3117>day,<s%> to go <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H3423>dispossess<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H1419>greater<s%> and <S%H6099>mightier<s%> than <S%H5892>yourself,<s%> cities <S%H1419>great<s%> and fortified <S%H1219>up<s%> to the <S%H8064>sky,<s%>

a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H7311>tall,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6062>Anakim,<s%> whom you <S%H3045>know,<s%> and of whom you have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3320>say,<s%> "Who can stand <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak?<s%>"

<S%H3045>Know<s%> therefore this <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is he who goes <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you as a <S%H398>devouring<s%> <S%H784>fire;<s%> he will <S%H8045>destroy<s%> <S%H3665>them,<s%> and he will bring them down before <S%H6440>you:<s%> so you shall drive them <S%H3423>out,<s%> and make them to <S%H6>perish<s%> <S%H4118>quickly,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has spoken to <S%H1696>you.<s%>

<S%H559>Don't<s%> say in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> after <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has thrust them <S%H1920>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, "For my <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has brought me <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> this <S%H776>land;<s%>" because <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> drives them <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you because of the <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> of these <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

Not for your <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> or for the <S%H3476>uprightness<s%> of your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> do you <S%H935>go<s%> in to <S%H3423>possess<s%> their <S%H776>land;<s%> but for the <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> of these <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> does drive them <S%H3423>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6965>you,<s%> and that he may establish the <S%H1697>word<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and to <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

<S%H3045>Know<s%> <S%H3068>therefore,<s%> that Yahweh your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>doesn't<s%> give you this <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it for your <S%H6666>righteousness;<s%> for you are a <S%H6203>stiff-necked<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H2142>Remember,<s%> <S%H7911>don't<s%> forget, how you provoked <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H7107>wrath<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> that you went <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> until you <S%H935>came<s%> to this <S%H4725>place,<s%> you have been <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
Also in <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> you <S%H7107>provoked<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H7107>wrath,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H599>angry<s%> with you to destroy <S%H8045>you.<s%>

When I was gone <S%H5927>up<s%> onto the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> to <S%H3947>receive<s%> the <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone,<s%> even the <S%H3871>tables<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> with <S%H3427>you,<s%> then I stayed on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights;<s%> I neither <S%H398>ate<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> nor <S%H8354>drank<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> to me the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%> with the <S%H676>finger<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%> and on them were all the <S%H1697>words<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with you on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly.<s%>

It came to pass at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights,<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> me the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone,<s%> even the <S%H3871>tables<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6965>me,<s%> "Arise, get <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4118>quickly<s%> from <S%H5971>here;<s%> for your people whom you have brought <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> have <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> <S%H4118>themselves;<s%> they have quickly turned <S%H5493>aside<s%> out of the <S%H1870>way<s%> which I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H6213>them;<s%> they have made them a molten <S%H4541>image.<s%>"
Furthermore <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying, "I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> this <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H6203>behold,<s%> it is a stiff-necked <S%H5971>people:<s%>

let me <S%H7503>alone,<s%> that I may <S%H8045>destroy<s%> <S%H4229>them,<s%> and blot out their <S%H8034>name<s%> from under the <S%H8064>sky;<s%> and I will <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H854>of<s%> you a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H6099>mightier<s%> and greater than <S%H7227>they.<s%>"

So I <S%H6437>turned<s%> and came <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> was <S%H1197>burning<s%> with <S%H784>fire:<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> were in my <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H2398>behold,<s%> you had sinned against <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> you had <S%H6213>made<s%> yourselves a <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H5695>calf:<s%> you had turned <S%H5493>aside<s%> <S%H4118>quickly<s%> out of the <S%H1870>way<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had commanded <S%H6680>you.<s%>

I <S%H8610>took<s%> hold of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> them out <S%H5921>of<s%> my <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and <S%H7665>broke<s%> them before your <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

I fell <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> as at the <S%H7223>first,<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights;<s%> I neither <S%H398>ate<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> nor <S%H8354>drank<s%> <S%H4325>water;<s%> because of all your <S%H2403>sin<s%> which you <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> in <S%H6213>doing<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to provoke him to <S%H3707>anger.<s%>

For I was <S%H3025>afraid<s%> <S%H6440>of<s%> the <S%H639>anger<s%> and hot <S%H2534>displeasure,<s%> with which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H7107>angry<s%> against you to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> <S%H3068>you.<s%> But Yahweh <S%H8085>listened<s%> to me that time <S%H6471>also.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H599>angry<s%> with <S%H175>Aaron<s%> to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> <S%H6419>him:<s%> and I prayed for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> also at the same <S%H6256>time.<s%>

I <S%H3947>took<s%> your <S%H2403>sin,<s%> the <S%H5695>calf<s%> which you had <S%H6213>made,<s%> and <S%H8313>burnt<s%> it with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H3807>stamped<s%> <S%H2912>it,<s%> grinding it very <S%H3190>small,<s%> until it was as <S%H1854>fine<s%> as <S%H6083>dust:<s%> and I <S%H7993>cast<s%> its <S%H6083>dust<s%> into the <S%H5158>brook<s%> that descended <S%H3381>out<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>
At <S%H8404>Taberah,<s%> and at <S%H4532>Massah,<s%> and at Kibroth <S%H6914>Hattaavah,<s%> you provoked <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H7107>wrath.<s%>

When <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> you from Kadesh <S%H6947>Barnea,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Go <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H4784>you;<s%>" then you rebelled against the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and you <S%H539>didn't<s%> believe <S%H8085>him,<s%> nor listen to his <S%H6963>voice.<s%>
You have been <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I knew <S%H3045>you.<s%>

So I fell <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> the <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights<s%> that I fell <S%H5307>down,<s%> because <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> he would destroy <S%H8045>you.<s%>

I <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>"Lord<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H7843>don't<s%> destroy your <S%H5971>people<s%> and your <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> that you have <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> through your <S%H1433>greatness,<s%> that you have brought <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> <S%H6437>don't<s%> look to the <S%H7190>stubbornness<s%> of this <S%H5971>people,<s%> nor to their <S%H7562>wickedness,<s%> nor to their <S%H2403>sin,<s%>

lest the <S%H776>land<s%> you brought us <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3068><s%> 'Because Yahweh was not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> them into the <S%H776>land<s%> which he <S%H1696>promised<s%> to <S%H8135>them,<s%> and because he hated <S%H3318>them,<s%> he has brought them out to <S%H4191>kill<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>'

Yet they are your <S%H5971>people<s%> and your <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> which you brought <S%H3318>out<s%> by your <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%> and by your <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm.<s%>"
